sourcesContent:
{{dialogTitle}}
Roll No label @if (feesForm.get('rollNo')?.hasError('required')) { Please enter roll no }
Student Name account_circle @if (feesForm.get('sName')?.hasError('required')) { Please enter student name }
Fees Type Annual Tution Transport Exam Library Other @if (feesForm.get('fType')?.hasError('required')) { Select Fees Type }
Date @if (feesForm.get('date')?.hasError('required')) { Please select date }
Invoice Number receipt @if (feesForm.get('invoiceNo')?.hasError('required')) { Enter Invoice Number }
Payment Type Cash Cheque Online Transfer Draft Other @if (feesForm.get('pType')?.hasError('required')) { Select Payment Type }
Status Paid Unpaid Pending @if (feesForm.get('status')?.hasError('required')) { Select Status }
Amount monetization_on @if (feesForm.get('amount')?.hasError('required')) { Enter amount }
